cookie-notice-text: Cookie Notice: I am delighted to inform you that my website operates without the use of cookies. Yes, you read it right. Absolutely no cookies here! I take pride in maintaining full compliance with the stringent GDPR regulations. Feel free to browse my site without any concerns about crumbs or privacy intrusion. Enjoy your cookie-free experience!

home-page-portfolio-content: Visit the 'My Projects' page to explore a collection of my past and current projects, ranging from web development to various non-technical projects. If you're looking for something more serious, check out the 'About Me' page where you'll find an updated CV and a bit less goofing around.
this-website-text: I undertook this project to learn more about React, CI/CD, and i18n automation using machine learning, and to expand my skills in web development.
